article_title: Obama's Quest To Increase Income Inequality--Starting With The Minimum Wage And Obamacare

article_metadata.description: President Obama's policies of raising the minimum wage and imposing Obamacare will, ironically, have the effect of increasing income inequality.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews
